attributes.action: action on the Women and Equalities Committee transgendered report
attributes.additional_details: Reduce NHS waiting times improve service to users as the report as asked
attributes.background: Women's equality inquiry shows the need for improvement in waiting times and more staffing levels with increased training in gender issues

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to implement the recommendations of the transgender report.
